notes: Sri Lanka: 50 runs in 12.4 overs, 60 minutes
Sri Lanka 100 runs in 24.3 overs, 114 minutes
K Sangakkara 50 runs in 77 balls, 98 minutes, 7x4, 0x6
Sri Lanka: 200 runs in 43.3 overs, 186 minutes
A Hall 50 runs in 77 balls, 97 minutes, 6x4, 1x0
South Africa: 100 runs in 24.1 overs, 103 minutes
South Africs 150 runs in 30.5 overs, 126 minutes

stories.title: 2nd Match, Sri Lanka v South Africa, Statistical Highlights
stories.summary: It was the 1604th ODI in cricket history

stories.title: Sri Lanka snatch victory from Proteas
stories.summary: For much of this afternoon, the spectators who had crowded into Galle International Stadium sat quietly on as their side drifted towards an apparently inevitable defeat
